qr.title: Exhibition Pass
footer: Please save a screenshot of this QR Code for your convenience during future use.
Please present this QR Code to our staff for registration.
This QR Code is valid only within the specified period.
This QR Code is intended exclusively for registered exhibitors to receive exhibitor benefits during the event.
The company reserves the right to cancel this QR Code without prior notice.
